thread.title: David Lynch memoir-bio coming in 2017
thread.title_full: David Lynch memoir-bio coming in 2017 - Yahoo News

author: news.yahoo.com
title: David Lynch memoir-bio coming in 2017
text:
NEW YORK (AP) — David Lynch wants to tell the straight story of his life, but with a little help.
The 69-year-old filmmaker is collaborating with his friend the journalist and critic Kristine McKenna on the memoir-biography "Life & Work," Grand Central Publishing announced Monday. The book will combine Lynch's reflections with material from McKenna based on dozens of interviews Lynch's friends, family and colleagues. Grand Central, a division of Hachette Book Group, plans a 2017 release.
Lynch's credits include the films "Blue Velvet," ''Eraserhead" and "The Straight Story" and the TV drama "Twin Peaks.
Books & Publishing Arts & Entertainment David Lynch Grand Central Publishing
